title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 504.3 - Prompt payment schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 504.3 - Prompt payment schedule

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by law or regulation or in
sections
504.4
and
504.5
of this Part, the date of
payment by the authority of an amount properly due and owing under a contract
shall be no later than 30 calendar days, excluding legal holidays, after such
receipt. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
504.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
